channel.title: Comments on: Trying to Counter Bad Habits

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Always love a quote from Kageyama. =D And it's always a pleasure to share great material on the blog! Thanks for taking the time to write your post and share your thoughts! I always find it very enlightening! =)
item.content:encoded:
Always love a quote from Kageyama. =D
And it’s always a pleasure to share great material on the blog! Thanks for taking the time to write your post and share your thoughts! I always find it very enlightening! =)

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.description: I think your plan is great. As Toshiro Kageyama says: it's always the right time to return to the fundamentals. Thanks for the shout-out!
item.content:encoded:
I think your plan is great. As Toshiro Kageyama says: it’s always the right time to return to the fundamentals.
Thanks for the shout-out!
